Translations.Text: Whomever BOH wills shchob keruvaty, Vin nadaye yoho skrynyu shyroku vidkryvayutʹ do Podannya. Ta whomever Vin wills shchob poslaty astray, Vin nadaye yoho intolerant skryni ta straitened, lyublyatʹ odyn khto pidnimayetʹsya do neba. BOH takym chynom rozmishchuye proklʹon na tsi khto vidmovlyayutʹsya poviryty
Tse yavlyaye soboyu pryamyy shlyakh do vashoho Lorda. My roz'yasnyly apokalipsys dlya lyudey shcho berutʹ uvahu
Vony zasluzhyly abode myru u yikhnʹomu Lordi; Vin yikhniy Lord ta Mayster, yak vynahoroda dlya yikhnikh pratsʹ

denʹ prybude koly Vin sklykaye usikh (ta kazhe): "O vy jinns, vy zayavyly bezlich humans." Yikhni lyudsʹki kompanyony skazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, my otrymaly nasolodu vid kozhnoyi kompaniyi inshykh' do my vytratyly zhyttya promizhok Vy vstanovyly dlya nas." Vin skazhe, "Peklo ye vasha dolya." Vony perebuyutʹ tam zavzhdy, z·hidno z BOZHYM budutʹ. Vash Lord ye Mudryy, Omniscient
My takym chynom match bezputnyy buty kompanyony odyn odnoho, yak pokarannya dlya yikhnikh porushennya

O vy jinns ta humans, vy ne otrymaly kur'yeriv z chysla vas, khto rozpoviyiv do vas Moyi vidkryttya, ta poperedyly vas pro zbory tsʹoho dnya? Vony skazhutʹ, "My dayemo svidchennya proty sobi." Vony povnistyu preoccupied z svitovo dovichnyy, ta vony budutʹ davaty svidchennya proty sebe shcho vony disbelievers
Tse musytʹ pokazaty shcho vash Lord nikoly ne vynyshchuye budʹ-yaku spilʹnotu nespravedlyvo, v toy chas, yak yoho lyudy unaware
